question: Assallaamualaykum.My wife gave birth to first child.We want to space out our children to give good attention and education.Can my wife use the pill.Please advise.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Q: Are contraceptions permissible?
A: All forms of reversible contraception (e.g. condoms, IUD, etc.) are
permissible on condition that it is not used out of fear of poverty and also
that it is consentual between husband and wife.

Hadhrat Abu Saéed Khudhry (RA) reports that one person asked Rasulullah
(Sallallaahu Álayhi Wasallam) about Azal (Coitus Interruptus). Rasulullah
(Sallallaahu Álayhi Wasallam) replied, 'When Allah Taãla intends creating a
child, nothing can stop him.' (Mishkãt pg. 275; Qadeemi)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
